statements: UPDATE car_design_team SET role = 'Designer', project_assignment = 'New Model' WHERE employee_id = 1;

UPDATE car_design_team SET role = 'Lead Designer', project_assignment = 'High Priority Project' WHERE employee_name = 'Alice' AND employee_id = 102;

UPDATE projects SET team_lead_id = 5, project_description='New project description' WHERE project_id = 3;
